scripts.build: yarn run ts:build && yarn workspaces foreach -pt run build
scripts.reinstall: docker run --rm --interactive --tty --network=host -v "$PWD:$PWD" -w "$PWD" -u "1000" node:16-alpine npx yarn@2 install
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:generated && yarn run clean:dependencies
scripts.clean:dependencies: rm -rf ee/*/node_modules || true; rm -rf packages/*/node_modules || true; rm -rf node_modules || true
scripts.clean:generated: rm -rf dist || true; rm -rf ee/*/dist || true; rm -rf ee/*/temp || true; packages/*/dist || true; rm -rf packages/*/temp || true
scripts.start: docker-compose up --detach && yarn run contember migrations:execute . --yes
scripts.ae:update: yarn run clean:generated && yarn run ts:build --clean && yarn run ts:build && yarn run ae:build
scripts.build:css: yarn workspaces foreach -p run yarn build:css
scripts.pw:build: docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run admin:pw:build
scripts.pw:debug-only: docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run admin:pw:debug
scripts.pw:test-only: docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run admin:pw:test
scripts.pw:update-only: docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run admin:pw:update
